game.name: DCS: F/A-18C Hornet The Serpent's Head 2 Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: The “Serpent's Head 2” is a 10 Mission Campaign for the DCS: F/A-18C Hornet. It comprises the next chapter of the 6 Mission “Serpent's Head” Campaign.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The “Serpent's Head 2” is a 10 Mission Campaign for the DCS: F/A-18C Hornet. It comprises the next chapter of the 6 Mission “Serpent's Head” Campaign.
